file_content.text: Your help made all the difference, my lord, but I don't know how long we can hold this position.
We've been losing soldiers as fast as we can replace them. But if you need the Empire's finest, we're there for you.
Thank you very much.
Anything I can do to help, my lord.
I'm tired of this! I won't weaken this base or allow any more soldiers to lose their lives on my account.
No. No more dead Imperials!
Maybe the project we were working on before the assaults could help.
It's an experimental pheromone, meant to control wild creatures. Can you imagine storming Thanaton's place with half the city zoo?
Of course, we don't know how long it lasts or even exactly how it works....
You had to know I'd love this sort of thing.
This is perfect for me.
My lord, next time I invent something, you'll be the first to know.
I'll take my chances, thank you.
I'm not risk-averse.
Take this--it's on a time release--into the zoo and expose the beasts to the chemical. Then lure them toward Thanaton's base.
Good luck, my lord.
On second thought, I think I'll stick with sentient species.
Never mind. I'll take the men.
Fair enough, my lord.
Good. I can't afford any more distractions.
It's about time.
Your wish is their command, my lord.
Once you're inside Thanaton's base, use this signaler and I'll send my men the order to attack.
My lord! Unbelievable. I never expected to see you again.
I'm sure you don't remember me.
On the contrary, Ilun, I never forget a faithful servant.
But I do.
Of course I do, your help was, um, inestimable.
[Lie] I remember!
I am humbled, my lord.
You're right. I don't.
Sorry.
Major Ilun, well, I was Captain Ilun then, wasn't I? Served under Major Bessiker. He got what he deserved, if you recall.
Major Ilun, well, I was Captain Ilun then, wasn't I? Served under Major Bessiker. He's retired now, you know.
After Balmorra was secured they transferred me to the Sullust Sector, and when the war broke out, they sent me here.
What can I do for you? We don't have much but what we do have is yours.
I need help invading Thanaton's base.
I'm at war with Thanaton.
Easier said than done.
I'm sure you've heard of my feud with Darth Thanaton. I am prepared to strike at his base, but I need backup.
I need soldiers.
There's a need I'm all too familiar with.
I need your men. I will not take "no" for an answer.
You have no choice.
Of course, my lord.
We've been getting clobbered, but we're expecting reinforcements. When they arrive, I should be able to form an assault squad for you.
Major Ilun, Republic soldiers, incoming!
